channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Fortify Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Fortify Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-25188|2024-08-03T04:36:05.956Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20fortify%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Fortify Plugin 20.2.34 and earlier does not sanitize the appName and appVersion parameters of its Pipeline steps, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to write or overwrite .xml files on the Jenkins controller file system with content not controllable by the attacker.
